"Maybe, how about we ask Dracona?" Sinesis says to Twister...
  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Friday, August 04, 2000 6:02 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Twister

  *Twist=
er smiles as Sinesis shakes her hand*

  Twister: Do you know of anyone tha=
t would like to die?

  *Twister asks Sinesis*

    ----- Original Message =
----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, Aug=
ust 04, 2000 5:52 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Sinesis eagerly shakes Twis=
ter's hand.

    "Partners!" Sinesis says...
      ----- Original Message -=
---- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent=
: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:40 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


      Twister


=
      *Twister looks at Sinesis*

      Twister: It seems that we have some=
thing in common and I need a partner too.

      *Twister extends her hand =
to Sinesis*

      Twister: Partner?

      *Twister asks Sinesis with her =
hand extended*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE=
 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:4=
5 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        "Traveling alone, though? What abou=
t all the bots we killed together? What about all of the times we took shot=
s for each other? It's horribly not fair. I wish I had a partner still." Si=
nesis said. He looked closer at Twister.

        "Hey, will you be my part=
ner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
      From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Se=
nt: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          =
Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



          *Twister looks at the sword and sigh=
s*

          Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my sister ha=
s a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

          *Twister=
 sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles into her arm compar=
tment*


          *Blizzard looks at Sinister and smiles*

          Blizz=
ard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.



          *Infectra smi=
les back at Airbomber*

          Infectra: I trust the both of you......I =
did trust the others but....

          *Infectra sighs*

          Infectr=
a: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl=
 of the good times because there were hardly none.

          *Infectra say=
s to Airbomber and grins*


            ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
       From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent:=
 Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
            Subject: Re: NBW


           =
 Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

            "He left this=
 here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just wish =
I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

            Sinister=
 held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

        =
    Stranato calls out.

            "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells thr=
ough the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

     =
       "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the oc=
curences happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he=
 hasn't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. H=
e laughed at his words...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
         From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
         Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
              Subject: Re=
: NBW


              Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



              *Twister l=
ooks at Sinesis*

              Twister: I've decided to let my sister be..=
.For she's my sister and I love her too much to pull her away from the she =
loves....

              *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a=
 two small pieces of energon both shaped like an eagle*

              Twis=
ter: Our parents gave us both one to unite us as sisters and friends foreve=
r and always help each other. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of =
the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident.....

              *Twister h=
olds out to Sinesis so he can see*



              (OOC: Ack! I meant The =
Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

              *Blizzard skips out of the=
 cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her han=
d out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



              *Infectra follows=
 Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


                ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
   =
             Subject: Re: NBW


                Sinesis sighs and stares at=
 Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

                Sinister frowns when he s=
ees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

                "Where are you=
 going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

                Stranato and Airb=
omber stop at the Maximal base, since they were never set on enemy and neve=
r betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
                  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
                 =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 =
6:46 PM
                  Subject: Re: NBW


                  Infectra/Wra=
th/Blizzard/Twister


                  *Infectra follows Stranato and Airb=
omber towards the Maximal Base*



                  *Wrath gets into a CR =
Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



         =
         *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Siniste=
r for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to hold h=
ands with him*



                  (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal B=
ase but I'm making her come back anyway.)

                  *Twister leave=
s the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else where an=
d went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

  =
                Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up here=
 thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister could=
 be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such happiness co=
uld happen.....

                  *Twister puts her double sided sword awa=
y stares at the table*


                    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
                    From: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
                    Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
           =
         Subject: NBW


                    Stranato and Airbomber walked t=
oward the Maximal base.

                    Gangon, still dying.

        =
            Deemos and Inzola confront one another several times, but Inzol=
a always runs from Deemos.

                    Etchingar called out to Meg=
atron.

                    "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

           =
         Time Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine=
 looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

                    Sinister cam=
e out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back toward Team U=
ltima's base.

                    Sinesis was healed and sat down next to =
Twister...
